data.name: No Skirt Convenience Shop
data.detailed_description:

About the Game

In ‚ÄúConvenience Store Without Skirts‚Äù story, a 29 years old single male Duanmuyi, after traveling around the world, he back to his hometown ‚Äì The Center City. To fulfill his foster mother‚Äôs dying wish, he spend all his money to run a convenience store and become a shop manage man. When pursuing his dream and have romantic love stories with his employees.
In this game, we combine SLG and AVG‚Äôs gameplay, player will discover female characters‚Äô unknowing pass while managing convenience store. In order to recreate most realistic convenience store experience, developers spend over half year doing field interview to present the most realistic interaction between shop keepers and customers. Hoping through the gameplay can give players the beautiful vision about love and marriage, and courage of starting their own career.

1. Taiwan-style products full of news.

2. Female employees with distinctive characteristics.

3. Rich side missions and events

4. Interesting and immersive convenience store management gameplay

5. Game plot with up to 150,000 words

data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
